title: The Secret sharer
creator_credit: Joseph Conrad, Larry Yust and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: A screen adaptation of a Joseph Conrad short story. This film concerns a young, inexperienced sea captain’s encounter with a fugitive from naval justice. Follows the captain endangering his ship through helping the fugitive, and shows how he regains control.
